verses.verse: Listen <S%H8085><s%> to this word, <S%H1697><s%> you cows <S%H6510><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> who are on the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Samaria, <S%H8111><s%> who oppress <S%H6231><s%> the poor, <S%H1800><s%> who crush <S%H7533><s%> the needy, <S%H34><s%> who tell <S%H559><s%> their husbands, <S%H113><s%> "Bring <S%H935><s%> us drinks! <S%H8354><s%>"

"I also have given <S%H5414><s%> you cleanness <S%H5356><s%> of teeth <S%H8127><s%> in all your cities, <S%H5892><s%> and lack <S%H2640><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%> in every town; <S%H4725><s%> yet you haven't <S%H7725><s%> returned to me, <S%H5002><s%>" says Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

"I also have withheld <S%H4513><s%> the rain <S%H1653><s%> from you, <S%H7969><s%> when there were yet three months <S%H2320><s%> to the harvest; <S%H7105><s%> and I caused it to rain <S%H4305><s%> on one <S%H259><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> and caused it not to rain <S%H4305><s%> on another <S%H259><s%> city. <S%H5892><s%> One <S%H259><s%> place <S%H2513><s%> was rained <S%H4305><s%> on, <S%H2513><s%> and the piece where it didn't <S%H4305><s%> rain withered. <S%H3001><s%>

"I sent <S%H7971><s%> plagues <S%H1698><s%> among you like <S%H1870><s%> I did Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> I have slain <S%H2026><s%> your young men <S%H970><s%> with the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and have carried away <S%H7628><s%> your horses; <S%H5483><s%> and I filled <S%H5927><s%> your nostrils <S%H639><s%> with the stench <S%H889><s%> of your camp, <S%H4264><s%> yet you haven't <S%H7725><s%> returned to me, <S%H5002><s%>" says Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

"I have overthrown <S%H2015><s%> some of you, <S%H430><s%> as when God overthrew <S%H4114><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah, <S%H6017><s%> and you were like a burning <S%H181><s%> stick plucked out <S%H5337><s%> of the fire; <S%H8316><s%> yet you haven't <S%H7725><s%> returned to me, <S%H5002><s%>" says Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

"Therefore thus will I do <S%H6213><s%> to you, <S%H3478><s%> Israel; because <S%H6118><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> this to you, <S%H3559><s%> prepare to meet <S%H7125><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
